Title: More than $70 billion is wiped off crypto market in 24 hours as bitcoin drops 8%
Description: Bitcoin briefly dropped as much as 8% on Friday, dipping back below $20,000 to near a two-month low, following turmoil from the collapse of Silvergate Bank earlier this week.
